title: EEGEdu
subtitle: Welcome to the EEGEdu live EEG tutorial. This tutorial is designed to be used with the Muse and the Muse 2 headbands from Interaxon and will walk you through the basics of EEG signal generation, data collection, and analysis with a focus on live control based on physiological signals. All demos are done in this browser. The first step will be to turn on your Muse headband and click the connect button. This will open a screen and will list available Muse devices. Select the serial number written on your Muse.
footer: EEGEdu - An Interactive Electrophysiology Tutorial with the Muse brought to you by Mathewson Sons
